b'Bessatsu Olympia Kyklos': b'Demetrios, a timid and kind vase painter in Ancient Greece who dislikes sports and competitions, is one day forced to come up with a game to compete with the mayor of the neighboring town in order to save his village. While hiding inside a large vase outside his workshop, lightning strikes the vase Demetrios is in, transferring him to Tokyo, Japan, during the 1964 Summer Olympics.\n\n(Source: MU)'
[b'Demetrios', b'Theophilos', b'Honeuros The Bard', b'Apollonia', b'Iwaya, Asakichi']
